channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: The Cockleshell Heroes
channel.desc: Major Stringer needs to assemble a crack squad of British Royal Marines for a highly unusual mission. Though Captain Thompson is extremely sceptical, he dutifully helps his new superior recruit and train the needed men. Their audacious plan involves transporting a small group of soldiers by submarine to the coast of occupied France, where they will kayak along an estuary into a Nazi shipyard and commit sabotage. Chances for success are very small.
